SECTION_1.HEADING: Accessibility statement for Reply to a jury summons
SECTION_1.GUIDANCE_1: This accessibility statement applies to the Reply to a jury summons service at
SECTION_1.GUIDANCE_2: This website is run by HM Courts and Tribunals Service (HMCTS). We want as many people as possible to be able to use this website. For example, that means you should be able to:
SECTION_1.LIST_ITEM_1: change colours, contrast levels and fonts
SECTION_1.LIST_ITEM_2: zoom in up to 300% without the text spilling off the screen
SECTION_1.LIST_ITEM_3: navigate most of the website using just a keyboard
SECTION_1.LIST_ITEM_4: navigate most of the website using speech recognition software
SECTION_1.LIST_ITEM_5: listen to most of the website using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)
SECTION_1.GUIDANCE_3: We’ve also made the website text as simple as possible to understand.
SECTION_1.GUIDANCE_5: has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.

SECTION_2.HEADING: How accessible this website is
SECTION_2.GUIDANCE_1: This website has been independently audited for accessibility and we are not aware of any parts of this website that are not fully accessible.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Reporting accessibility problems with this website
SECTION_3.GUIDANCE_1: We’re always looking to improve the accessibility of this website. If you find any problems not listed on this page or think we’re not meeting accessibility requirements:

SECTION_4.HEADING: Enforcement procedure
SECTION_4.GUIDANCE_1: The Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) is responsible for enforcing the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 (the ‘accessibility regulations’). If you’re not happy with how we respond to your complaint,
SECTION_4.EASS_LINK: contact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS)

SECTION_5.HEADING: Contacting us by email or phone
SECTION_5.GUIDANCE_1: You can contact our customer service team at the Jury Central Summoning Bureau:

SECTION_6.HEADING: Technical information about this website’s accessibility
SECTION_6.GUIDANCE_1: HMCTS is committed to making its website accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.
